title: Portugal: Carnations Against Dictatorship
overview: In Portugal, during the night of April 24-25, 1974, a peaceful uprising put an end to the last government of the Estado Novo, the authoritarian regime established in 1933 by dictator Ant√≥nio de Oliveira Salazar (1889-1970), paving the way for full democracy: a chronicle of the Carnation Revolution.
